trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_MUTAMIX_000_000<tab>Process of shifty-making is of big help-use. First, be taking five need-not materia, yes? Melty-mix this one, mixy-melt that one, squeeze and squash, then bigeyes! Five need-not are reborn as one shiny-new!

TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_MUTAMIX_000_001<tab>What kind of materia is reborn? Such knowings do not rattle Mutamix's braincase. Maybe new materia is worth much jinglyshine; maybe it is even more scrappyjunk than five before. Shifty-making is exciting chance-game, yes?

TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Mutamix will perform materia transmutation for you at any time, free of charge. Bring the goblin five pieces of unwanted materia, and he will transform them into a single new piece to use as you see fit.

TEXT_CMNDEFMATERIASLOTTALK_00175_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>That said, materia transmutation remains an inexact science. As for what manner of materia will emerge each time Mutamix works his wonders, not even the goblin genius himself can say.
